hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" GIT_VERSION="v0"
IMAGE_VERSION="v0.0.1"
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then GIT_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) fi
TIME_VERSION=$(date +%s)
IMAGE_VERSION=$GIT_VERSION.$TIME_VERSION
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u swr.cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/common/ci-bot:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/common/ci-bot:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/common/ci-bot:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "docker is not installed." fi
if [ -d "infra-openeuler" ]; then rm -rf "infra-openeuler" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-openeuler cd infra-openeuler/applications/bot/release else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/common/ci-bot=swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/common/ci-bot:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update openeulerbot image to $IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi
